name: INSANE ENOUGH
description:
INTRO:

Who likes to kill mad robots ?... Then this will be the game u will be waiting for.

This game is created by a indegame developer, J.S.P.0.0.7

This game is under development and available only for windows.

CONTROLS:

W,Up Arrow - Forward

S,Down Arrow - Backward

A,Left Arrow - Left

D,Right Arrow - Right

Q - Slow motion mode

R - Reload

Left Control,Left Mouse - Shoot

Space - Jump

Esc - Pause

SOFTWARES USED:

Unity 5.6.7

Blender 2.78

Photoshop CC

CONCLUSION:

Hope you enjoyed the game.

Have fun.
